summary: My Sister (who has not watched Critical Role and knows nothing about D&D): “Why are you holding his hand? He’d probably eat...
caption:
My Sister (who has not watched Critical Role and knows nothing about D&D): “Why are you holding his hand? He’d probably eat you.” :\

Me: “Yeah he probably would.”

I’m watching episode 29 now, and I still miss him. I was actually a little surprised that, when the carpet got ruined and Vax and Keyleth were mourning it, the literal first thing Liam/Vax says after saying that they had good memories with that carpet was: “We found Clarota on that carpet- Never mind. Let’s not talk about that.”

reblog.comment:
My Sister (who has not watched Critical Role and knows nothing about D&D): “Why are you holding his hand? He’d probably eat you.” :\

Let’s not talk about that.”

Me: “Yeah he probably would.”

I’m watching episode 29 now, and I still miss him. I was actually a little surprised that, when the carpet got ruined and Vax and Keyleth were mourning it, the literal first thing Liam/Vax says after saying that they had good memories with that carpet was: “We found Clarota on that carpet- Never mind. Let’s not talk about that.”
trail.content:
My Sister (who has not watched Critical Role and knows nothing about D&D): “Why are you holding his hand? He’d probably eat you.” :\

Me: “Yeah he probably would.”

I’m watching episode 29 now, and I still miss him. I was actually a little surprised that, when the carpet got ruined and Vax and Keyleth were mourning it, the literal first thing Liam/Vax says after saying that they had good memories with that carpet was: “We found Clarota on that carpet- Never mind. Let’s not talk about that.”

summary: "The problem with friends is that you have to care about them..."   I’m working on getting caught up on Critical Role and drew a...
caption:
“The problem with friends is that you have to care about them…" 

 I’m working on getting caught up on Critical Role and drew a sad dirty wizard because I have too many emotions. The last few episodes have hit HARD, man. ;-;

summary: I entirely understand Keyleth’s view in episode 26. The team put themselves in a very precarious situation and were going down...
body:
I entirely understand Keyleth’s view in episode 26. The team put themselves in a very precarious situation and were going down the path of “murder-hobos” for lack of a better term, and Matt responding to this through this Trial is very interesting…

Still watching but I stand by Keyleth 100%

reblog.comment:
I entirely understand Keyleth’s view in episode 26. The team put themselves in a very precarious situation and were going down the path of “murder-hobos” for lack of a better term, and Matt responding to this through this Trial is very interesting…

blog.name: themetaisawesome
blog.title: Long May He Reign
blog.description:
Irish American. Cisgender, heterosexual man.
This is a multi-fandom blog, including Pacific Rim, RvB, GLTAS, super heroes, ATLA, LOTR, Mad Max, FMA, Carmilla, Dragon Age, Mass Effect, Gravity Falls, Critical Role, Steven Universe, Wynonna Earp, and many, many more. If you decide to follow me and have certain tags blacklisted, politely notify me and I will happily tag to the best of my ability to respect your personal blacklist.
